Title: Killing Them Softly
Writer: Andrew Dominik (screenplay), George V. Higgins (based on the novel "Cogan's Trade" by)
Actors: Brad Pitt, Scoot McNairy, Ben Mendelsohn, James Gandolfini
Plot: Three amateurs stickup a Mob protected card game, causing the local criminal economy to collapse. Brad Pitt plays the hitman hired to track them down and restore order.
